瑄字的基本解释

瑄
xuān
古代祭天用的大璧：“有司奉瑄玉。”

瑄字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xuān］
［《廣韻》須緣切，平仙，心。］
古代祭天用的大璧。参见“瑄玉”。

瑄字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　瑄； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页736第20
【唐韻】須緣切【集韻】【韻會】荀緣切【正韻】息緣切，?音宣。【說文】璧六寸也。【前漢·郊祀志】有司奉瑄玉。【孟康註】璧大六寸謂之瑄。　又【集韻】通作宣。【爾雅·釋器】璧大六寸謂之宣。【註】漢書所云瑄玉是也。 考證：〔【說文】通作宣。〕　謹按說文無此語，查係集韻宣字註。 謹將說文改爲集韻。

瑄字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
瑄字的起名意思

：古代祭天用的大璧。如瑄玉。

Xuan
Basic explanation of words
Xuan
xuān
The ancient big wall used to sacrifice to heaven: "There is Si Feng Xuan Yu."
Xuan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xuān］
["Guangyun" beard edge cut, flat immortal, heart. ]
A big wall used in ancient times for offering sacrifices to the heavens. See "Xuan Yu".
Xuan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　瑄; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Pages: 736-20
【Tang Yun】Beard edge cutting [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Xun Yuan cutting [Zheng Yun] Xi Yuan cutting,? Yin Xuan. [Said the text] Bi six inches also. [Pre-Han · Jiao Si Zhi] There is Si Feng Xuanyu. [Mengkang's Note] Bi big six inches is called Zhixuan.　[Jiyun] is a public announcement. [Erya·Release Device] Bi Da 6 inches is called Xuan. [Note] Yun Xuanyu in Hanshu is also. Textual research: [[Said Wen] is a public announcement. 〕　 I would like to say that there is no such word in the text, please check the Jiyun Xuanzi Note. I would like to change Shuowen to Jiyun.

Name meaning
: A big bi used for sacrificing to the heavens in ancient times. Such as Xuanyu.
xuān
сущ. сюань (также 瑄玉; древняя регалия из нефрита с отверстием посредине, носилась на поясе)
